author: Jeffrey Morgenthaler
description: As the name suggests, this drink is dominated by amaretto, with lemon juice providing the sour balancing element and a slug of bourbon giving backbone.
name: Amaretto Sour (by Jeffrey Morgenthaler)
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Demerara / dark Muscovado / brown sugar

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and pour into ice-filled glass
